description: Primes whose sum of digits is a multiple of 5.
example: 569 is a prime with sum of digits = 20, hence belongs to the sequence.
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(10000) | &+Intseq(p) mod 5 eq 0 ]; - Vincenzo Librandi, Apr 02 2011
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 21 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Harvey P. Dale_ and Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jul 04 2001
